TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IpcChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class IpcChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type IpcChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelSender interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 提供使用 IPC 协议传输消息的信道实现。

span.span: Provides a channel implementation that uses the IPC protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .Net Framework 远程处理基础结构使用的通道用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the.NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时，则会将调用序列化到一条消息是由客户端通道发送和接收的服务器信道。When a client calls a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 收到的消息后，它是反序列化和处理。After the message is received, it is deserialized and processed. 任何返回的值是由服务器通道传输和接收的客户端通道。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 类是一个组合的功能的方便类类和类。The class is a convenience class combining the functionality of the class and the class. > [!CAUTION] > 设置时`exclusiveAddressUse`属性`false`中`properties`参数，多个为相同命名管道，可以注册对象。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在这种情况下请求可以转到任何注册的通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 此设置被视为安全还使用 alc 时，才才。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用设置远程处理服务器和其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 此示例包含三个部分：The example contains three parts: - 一台服务器A server - 客户端A client - 使用服务器和客户端的远程对象。A remote object used by the server and the client. 下面的代码示例演示服务器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/server.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/server.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例演示了此服务器的客户端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/client.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/client.cs#20)] 下面的代码示例演示使用在服务器和客户端的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

summary.span: 使用指定的配置属性和接收器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). 信道接收器提供插件的点，它允许访问基础消息流经通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到的远程对象的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器也要负责客户端和服务器之间的消息传输。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 信道接收器链中链接在一起，所有信道消息流过此接收器链之前最终序列化和传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`clientSinkProvider`和`serverSinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`. > [!CAUTION] > 设置时`exclusiveAddressUse`属性`false`中`properties`参数，多个为相同命名管道，可以注册对象。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在这种情况下请求可以转到任何注册的通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 此设置被视为安全还使用 alc 时，才才。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/server2.cs#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道具有一个唯一名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 该名称用于检索特定通道时调用。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . 默认名称为"ipc"。The default name is "ipc". ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传递给指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的通道消息接收器将消息传送到任一指定的 URL 或通道数据对象。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or channel data object. 如果`uri`参数是`null`，`remoteChannelData`用作接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 请`url`或`remoteChannelData`参数可以是`null`，但不是两者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. 信道接收器提供插件的点，它允许访问基础消息流经通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到的远程对象的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器链中的链接在一起`ChannelSinkProviders`之前，所有信道消息流经此接收器链最终序列化和传输消息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of `ChannelSinkProviders` and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 指示当前信道开始侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要调用此方法以开始侦听新初始化的通道。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用此方法重新启动后的通道上侦听调用方法。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called. `data`参数可以用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果不希望将特定状态传递到通道，设置`data`到`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以停止侦听通道上。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新开始侦听，使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. `data`参数可以用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果不希望将特定状态传递到通道，设置`data`到`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
